skillDetails.name: Spawn of Champions
skillDetails.description: Aura: Aquatic and Warrior Monsters in the party start with Might, Glory, or Regeneration. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: Aquatic and Warrior Monsters in the party start with Might, Glory, or Regeneration. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.
